summary: An email from an automated BOP system forwarding a message from a concerned user about Jeffrey Epstein's potential escape risk and manipulative behavior while incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of concern regarding potential escape attempts and manipulative behavior while incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Concern email about Epstein's behavior
events.description: An email was sent via the BOP website expressing concern that Jeffrey Epstein may try to escape and engages in psychopathic, manipulative behavior.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A concerned individual contacted the BOP on July 18, 2019, warning that Jeffrey Epstein might attempt to escape from custody.
The message described Epstein as engaging in psychopathic and manipulative behavior while incarcerated.
The email was sent through the BOP's automated system and forwarded to relevant parties on July 21, 2019.
Epstein was held at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York at the time of this correspondence.
